mapper.update: UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BOOK_NAME=#{book_name}, BOOK_RATE=#{book_rate}, BOOK_SALE=#{book_sale} WHERE BOOK_NUM=#{book_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, BK.* FROM (select * from BANKBOOK order by book_num DESC) BK) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANKBOOK(BOOK_NUM, BOOK_NAME, BOOK_RATE, BOOK_SALE) VALUES(ACCOUT_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{book_name}, #{book_rate}, #{book_sale})
